title: Twisted Secrets: Part 1
description: The first book of the Twisted Series.Kara is tired of the game and wants out, but Cairo, the man she used to love, won't let that happen. His twin sister, Egypt, hates him and wants him gone for good. Egypt will get rid of anyone in her way to make that happen. Gabriel has found the love of his life, but how far will he go to keep it safe? Everyone is wearing a mask and no one wants to be found out, with a twist that no one will see coming.
author: Tauicita Jones
